subject: Horses
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Jess Jackson, the billionaire who founded Kendall-Jackson Vineyards with his family in California, has transfixed the sport with a lawsuit in which he asserts that he was defrauded out of more than $3 million by agents involved in horse trading.
snippet: Jess Jackson, the billionaire who founded Kendall-Jackson Vineyards with his family in California, has transfixed the sport with a lawsuit in which he asserts that he was defrauded out of more than $3 million by agents involved in horse trading.
